info:identity.info:name: com.ibm.streamsx.messagehub
info:identity.info:description:
# Overview
This toolkit integrates IBM Streams with the IBM Event Streams cloud service. This toolkit is a specialized version of the [https://github.com/IBMStreams/streamsx.kafka|Kafka-Toolkit], which simplifies the setup for connecting to the cloud service.
# Additional information
For changes in this toolkit release, see [https://github.com/IBMStreams/streamsx.messagehub/blob/v3.3.1/com.ibm.streamsx.messagehub/CHANGELOG.md|the change log in public Github]
